Screenshot Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2018-01-18  | Version: 0.0.8-SNAPSHOT
Screenshot Maven Plugin
Parent Project

Project Documentation
  • Project Reports

screenshot:upload

Full name:

se.bluebrim.maven.plugin:screenshot-maven-plugin:0.0.8-SNAPSHOT:upload

Description:

Mojo that generates screen shots and uploads them to a CMS.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
uploadBaseUrl String - The content management base URL that is appended with the screenshot file name and used in the POST request.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
locales List - A screenshot will be created for each Locale where the file name is appended with the Locale as string.

Parameter Details

locales:

A screenshot will be created for each Locale where the file name is appended with the Locale as string.
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

uploadBaseUrl:

The content management base URL that is appended with the screenshot file name and used in the POST request.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
